nodes.bodyText:
Please consider the following suggestion:
This class can listen to WorkspaceProjectContextChangeEvent.
Thus you can update a variable, say name, every time this event is fired.
Then you can simply return name in the getName method.
This would make this bean always up-to-date every time the project context is changed.

nodes.bodyText: @caponetto As per your suggestion, I tried using the WorkspaceProjectContextChangeEvent in this implementation and I observed that  WorkspaceProjectContextChangeEvent is not always fired when we change the branch in the view.

nodes.bodyText: You need to inject it, don't you? Also, I think it is better to use the interface.
I have injected the interface of CurrentBranch.
As I've commented on the appformer PR, I think you don't need to make changes on this class.
I am removing this as per the changes in appformer PR.
